lyrics:
9 contributorsright here lyricsverse 1
ill be right here where you need me
anytime just keep believin
and ill be right here
if you ever need a friend
someone to care and understand
ill be right here

chorus
all you have to do is call my name
no matter how close or far away
ask me once and ill come ill come runnin
and when i cant be with you dream me near
keep me in your heart and ill appear
all you gotta do is turn around close your eyes look inside
im right here

verse 2
isnt it great that you know that
im ready to go wherever youre at
anywhere ill be there

chorus
all you have to do is call my name
no matter how close or far away
ask me once and ill come ill come runnin
and when i cant be with you dream me near
keep me in your heart and ill appear
all you gotta do is turn around close your eyes look inside
im right here
you might also likebridge
whenever you need me
theres no need to worry
you know that im gonna be right here

chorus
ask me once and ill come ill come runnin
and when i cant be with you dream me near
keep me in your heart and ill appear
all you gotta do is turn around close your eyes look inside
im right here

outro
oh yeah yeah
im right hereembed
